channel.title: PI Help
channel.description:
Hi. How do I change PI Base ExpRates for Skilling/Combat. ATM you can get a 99 in 5 minutes. How can I edit that?
Matt

item.title: PI Help
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

If you now the line numbers (like the character interface) I believe you could just add it in the writeQuestTab method.

Read full topic

@deans1243 wrote:

yea that is for quest tab^^^ :p, and as for the logout button and the bank name i think it is client sided in rsinterface.java

Read full topic

item.title: PI Help
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Add this into your PlayerAssisstant.java. I took it straight out of my server so just edit it accordingly. Logout button is somewhere, just search the text on the interface.

Character is at the bottom.

public void writeQuestTab() {
sendFrame126(Config.SERVER_NAME+" Quests", 640);

sendFrame126("First Quest Line", 7332);
sendFrame126("", 7333);
sendFrame126("", 7334);
sendFrame126("", 7336);

sendFrame126("", 7344);
sendFrame126("", 7345);
sendFrame126("", 7347);
sendFrame126("", 7348);

/*Members Quests*/
sendFrame126("", 12772);
/*Unknown ID*/
sendFrame126("", 7352);
sendFrame126("", 12129);

	}
